sense.name: A feeling of joy or contentment.
sense.commentary: PLEASURE[+emotion] Note: usually expressed as "with pleasure"
sense.examples: He was tingling with pleasure. I was filled with pleasure.

sense.name: Something that affords enjoyment.
sense.examples: It was a true pleasure to behold. He puts duty before pleasure. The new car is a pleasure to drive. He took his pleasure of her.

sense.name: A formal expression concerning duty.
sense.examples: He serves at the pleasure of the President. I serve at the pleasure of the Queen. We all work at the pleasure of our CEO.
